title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining of Vegetable Species) (Amendment) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 121 of 2004) are amended by 
substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as amended by 
European Communities (Minimum Conditions for examining of Vegetable 
Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 49 of 2020) the following- 

“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/91/EC of 6 October 
20032 as amended by Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 
2021/746 of 6 May 2021;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 121 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) regulation 2020 (s.i no 49 2020) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 91 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2021 746 6 may 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 49 of 2020) are 
revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 O.J. No. L160, 07.05.2021, p 94 
2 O.J. No. L254, 08.10.2003, p. 11 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [753] 3

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/746 of 6 May 2021 which amends Council Directive 
2003/91/EC on the protocols for the examination of certain varieties of vegetable 
species. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [753]
